privacy.title: Privacy & Data
privacy.description: Learn how your data is stored and protected
privacy.noResults: No privacy topics match your search
privacy.bannerDescription: All conversations are stored locally on your device. Data processing happens within MSF systems using Azure infrastructure.

contact.title: Contact & Resources

settings.Reset Confirmation Message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? This will restore default values for temperature, theme, and other preferences. Your conversations, prompts, and tones will not be affected.

settings.backupDescription: Create a complete backup of all your data including conversations, prompts, tones, folders, and settings.
settings.clearDataWarning: Delete all conversation history from local storage. This cannot be undone.
settings.teamTemplatesDescription: Package your prompts, tones, folders, and custom agents into a shareable file that other team members can import.
settings.Display Name Description: Choose how your name appears in greetings and throughout the app
settings.Scan this QR code with your mobile devic: Scan this QR code with your mobile device to start the install process
settings.Access the app directly from your home s: Access the app directly from your home screen
settings.PWA Safari Warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è You must use Safari browser on iOS - Chrome and other browsers do not support installing web apps on iOS.
settings.PWA Install Tip: üí° Tip: Once installed, you can launch the app from your home screen just like a regular app - no browser needed!
settings.PWA Note: Note: This is a Progressive Web App (PWA). It installs like a native app but runs through your browser's technology. All your data stays private and secure on your device.
settings.Learn more about Progressive Web Apps: Learn more about Progressive Web Apps

createDiagrams.title: Create Diagrams
createDiagrams.prompt: Show me how you can create diagrams and flowcharts. What kinds of processes, workflows, or systems can you help me visualize? Give me some examples.

draftContent.title: Draft Professional Content
draftContent.prompt: I need help writing professional documents - emails, reports, summaries. Can you show me examples of how you can help with different types of business writing?

analyzeInformation.title: Analyze Information
analyzeInformation.prompt: How can you help me analyze data or information? Show me different ways you might break down numbers, find patterns, or extract insights from documents or datasets.

planOrganize.title: Plan & Organize
planOrganize.prompt: Can you help me plan projects or organize work? Give me examples of how you might create timelines, agendas, or project plans with different structures.

brainstormIdeas.title: Brainstorm Ideas
brainstormIdeas.prompt: I want to brainstorm solutions to a problem. Show me how you approach creative thinking and idea generation - what kinds of questions would you ask and how do you explore possibilities?

buildPresentations.title: Build Presentations
buildPresentations.prompt: How can you help me create presentations? Show me examples of different presentation structures, visual suggestions, and how you organize information for different audiences.

workWithCode.title: Work with Code
workWithCode.prompt: Can you help with coding or scripts? Show me examples - whether it's writing new code, debugging issues, or explaining how something works step-by-step.

decisionSupport.title: Decision Support
decisionSupport.prompt: I need to make a decision but I'm not sure how to evaluate my options. Can you show me different frameworks or approaches you use to help think through choices?

summarizeSynthesize.title: Summarize & Synthesize
summarizeSynthesize.prompt: How do you help with summarizing long documents or synthesizing information from multiple sources? Show me examples of different summary formats and levels of detail.

explainTopics.title: Explain Complex Topics
explainTopics.prompt: Can you explain complicated concepts in simple terms? Show me how you break down complex ideas, use analogies, and adapt explanations for different knowledge levels.

createSchedules.title: Create Schedules
createSchedules.prompt: I need help organizing time and creating schedules. Show me different ways you can structure agendas, calendars, or time-based plans with examples.

agents.description: Create and manage custom AI agents with specialized capabilities. These agents run on the MSF AI Assistant Foundry instance.
agents.advancedFeatureTitle: Advanced Feature - Requires Coordination with AI Assistant Technical Team
agents.advancedFeatureWarning: Custom agents only work with the MSF AI Assistant Foundry instance. Agent IDs must be created by the AI Assistant technical team in this specific instance and coordinated with you before use.
agents.noAgentsDescription: Create your first custom agent to extend AI capabilities with specialized tools and behaviors.

advancedOptions.title: Advanced Options
advancedOptions.fixedTemperatureNote: Note: This model uses fixed temperature values for consistent performance.

searchMode.title: Search Mode
searchMode.subtitle: Will use web search when needed
searchMode.azureAgentModeDescription: Faster but stores conversation data in the cloud
searchMode.privacyInfoDescription: Your full conversation will be sent to Azure AI Foundry agent.

customAgent.label: Custom Agent:
customAgent.description: This agent runs on the MSF AI Assistant Foundry instance with tools always enabled.

gpt_4_1.name: GPT-4.1
gpt_4_1.description: AI model powered by GPT-4.1 with real-time web search via Bing. Provides up-to-date information, fact-checking, and current event awareness. Best for research requiring recent information, news analysis, and fact verification.

gpt_5_2.name: GPT-5.2
gpt_5_2.description: OpenAI's most advanced model, excelling at complex reasoning, code generation, and technical problem-solving. Best for analytical tasks, programming challenges, research, and detailed explanations. Supports adjustable reasoning effort and response verbosity.

gpt_5_mini.name: GPT-5 Mini
gpt_5_mini.description: Faster and more cost-effective variant of GPT-5, optimized for speed while maintaining high quality. Perfect for everyday tasks, quick queries, tool routing, and applications requiring fast response times. Excellent balance of performance and efficiency.

gpt_5_2_chat.name: GPT-5.2 Chat
gpt_5_2_chat.description: Specialized variant of GPT-5.2 optimized for conversational interactions and emotional intelligence. Excels at empathetic communication, mental health support, creative writing, brainstorming, and natural dialogue. Best for casual conversations, counseling scenarios, and tasks requiring emotional awareness.

o3.name: o3
o3.description: OpenAI's most advanced reasoning model with breakthrough problem-solving capabilities. Excels at complex mathematics, scientific reasoning, coding challenges, and multi-step logical tasks. Extended 200K context window. Supports reasoning effort control.

llama_4_maverick.name: Llama 4 Maverick
llama_4_maverick.description: Fast and cost-effective model from Meta. Great for everyday tasks like writing, summarization, and basic coding help. Good balance of speed and quality for routine work.

deepseek_r1.name: DeepSeek-R1
deepseek_r1.description: Reasoning specialist that shows its work step-by-step. Excellent for math problems, logic puzzles, and understanding complex concepts. See how it thinks through problems in real-time.

deepseek_v3_1.name: DeepSeek-V3.1
deepseek_v3_1.description: Strong all-around model especially good at coding and technical writing. Great for debugging code, writing documentation, and explaining technical concepts. Fast and reliable for development work.

grok_3.name: Grok 3
grok_3.description: Versatile model from xAI known for nuanced responses. Great for open-ended discussions, creative projects, and tackling complex problems.

claude_opus_4_5.name: Claude Opus 4.5
claude_opus_4_5.description: Anthropic's most capable model with exceptional reasoning, coding, and creative abilities. Best for complex analysis, research, and tasks requiring deep understanding.

claude_sonnet_4_5.name: Claude Sonnet 4.5
claude_sonnet_4_5.description: Balanced Claude model offering excellent performance across coding, analysis, and creative tasks. Great for everyday use with fast response times.

claude_opus_4_1.name: Claude Opus 4.1
claude_opus_4_1.description: Previous generation Claude Opus model. Excellent for complex coding tasks, detailed analysis, and nuanced understanding.

claude_haiku_4_5.name: Claude Haiku 4.5
claude_haiku_4_5.description: Fast and cost-effective Claude model optimized for quick tasks. Great for simple queries, summarization, and high-volume applications.

searchMode.title: Search Mode Explained
searchMode.subtitle: Understanding your search options and where your data is stored
searchMode.noSearchDescription: Fastest responses with no web search capability. Your full conversation stays in your browser - nothing is stored in the cloud.
searchMode.viewDetailsBelow: For more details, view the technical workflow below.
searchMode.legendNoSearch: Your Browser (local storage) | AI Assistant Server | Azure OpenAI (stateless)
searchMode.privacyDescription: Uses web search when needed but is slower because more steps are involved. Only search queries are stored in Azure - your full conversation stays in your browser.
searchMode.legendPrivacy: Your Browser (local storage) | AI Assistant Server | Azure AI Foundry (search queries only) | Azure OpenAI (stateless)
searchMode.foundryDescription: Faster responses with web search capability built-in. Your full conversation is stored in Azure AI Foundry's database, not just in your browser.
searchMode.legendFoundry: Your Browser (local storage) | AI Assistant Server | Azure AI Foundry Agent (stores full conversation)
searchMode.whyTheseOptionsText1: These are the available search implementations after Azure deprecated their Bing Search API, which the AI Assistant originally relied on.
searchMode.whyTheseOptionsText2: The team is actively exploring more privacy-focused search alternatives. Both current options use Azure AI Foundry's search capabilities but differ in how much conversation data is shared.
searchMode.azureDeprecatedBingApi: Azure deprecated their Bing Search API
searchMode.footerNote: Both modes store your conversation locally in your browser. You can switch modes anytime in the model settings.

descriptions.foundLegacyData: We found data from a previous version. Would you like to migrate it to work with the improved system?
descriptions.storageSpaceWarning: Your data requires more space than is currently available. We recommend using incremental migration mode.
descriptions.pleaseWait: Please wait while we update your data...
descriptions.dataIsSafe: Your original data is safe. You can try again or skip for now.
descriptions.itemsTooLarge: These items are too large to fit in storage. You can export them, free up space, or continue without them.

fileUpload.failedToOpenInEditor: Failed to open file in code editor. Please try again.

artifact.editsNotSaved: Edits are not saved. Send via message or download to save any edits.
artifact.fileIncludedWithMessage: File and edits included with message

codeEditor.startTyping: Start typing or ask AI to generate code
codeEditor.codeWillSync: Code will automatically sync from chat messages
